title: Litany In Honour Of St. John Vianney, The Curé Of Ars
content:
LITANY IN HONOUR OF
ST. JOHN-MARY VIANNEY
(THE CURÉ D'ARS).
Lord, have mercy on us.
Lord, have mercy on us.
Christ, have mercy on us.
Christ, have mercy on us.
Lord, have mercy on us.
Lord, have mercy on us.
Christ, hear us.
Christ, graciously hear us.
God the Father of Heaven,
Have mercy on us.
God the Son, Redeemer of the world,
Have mercy on us.
God the Holy Ghost,
Have mercy on us.
Holy Trinity, One God,
Have mercy on us.
Holy Mary, Mother of God,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, endowed with grace from thine infancy,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, model of filial piety,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, devoted servant of the Immaculate Heart of Mary,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, spotless lily of purity,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, faithful imitator of the sufferings of Christ,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, abyss of humility,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, seraph of prayer,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, faithful adorer of the Most Blessed Sacrament,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, ardent lover of holy poverty,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, true son of St. Francis of Assisi,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, exemplary Franciscan tertiary,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, tender friend of the poor,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, penetrated with the fear of God's judgment,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, fortified by divine visions,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, who was tormented by the evil spirit,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, perfect model of sacerdotal virtue,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, firm and prudent pastor,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, inflamed with zeal,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, faithful attendant of the sick,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, indefatigable catechist,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, who didst preach in words of fire,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, wise director of souls,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, specially gifted with the spirit of counsel,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, enlightened by light from Heaven,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, formidable to Satan,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, compassionate with every misery,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, providence of the orphans,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, favored with the gift of miracles,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, who didst reconcile so many sinners to God,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, who didst confirm so many of the just in the way of virtue,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, who didst taste the sweetness of death,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, who dost now rejoice in the glory of Heaven,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, who givest joy to those who invoke thee,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, heavenly patron of parish priests,
pray for us.
Saint John-Mary Vianney, model and patron of directors of souls,
pray for us.
Lamb of God, Who takest away the sins of the world,
Spare us, O Lord.
Lamb of God, Who takest away the sins of the world,
Hear us, O Lord.
Lamb of God, Who takest away the sins of the world,
Have mercy on us.
Christ, hear us.
Christ, graciously hear us.
V. Pray for us, Saint John-Mary Vianney,
R. That we may be made worthy of the promises of Christ.
Let Us Pray;
Almighty and merciful God,
Who didst bestow upon Saint John-Mary Vianney
wonderful pastoral zeal
and a great fervor for prayer and penance,
grant, we beseech Thee,
that by his example and intercession
we may be able to gain the souls
of our brethren for Christ,
and with them attain to everlasting glory,
through the same Lord Jesus Christ Thy Son,
Who liveth and reigneth with Thee
and the Holy Ghost,
one God, world without end.
Amen.
